store.mission: To craft bold, sustainable luxury that empowers women to express their truth — through garments and accessories that radiate beauty, integrity, and confidence.

founders.name: Isolde Maren
founders.background: Descended from European glass artisans, inspired by light, beauty, and storytelling.

founders.name: Danielle Brooks
founders.background: Former New York fashion buyer, expert in forecasting trends and accessible exclusivity.

store.founding_story: Born from a spirited debate at The Met about whether luxury could exist without illusion, Vera Lux unites luminous artistry with pragmatic business sense to deliver truth-infused glamour.

personality_tone.voice: Fierce, unapologetic, and empowering — with a sharp edge of sophistication.
personality_tone.flavor: New York flash meets timeless artistry.
personality_tone.imagery: Manhattan skylines at twilight, marble-and-glass interiors, women framed by urban parks and iconic architecture.

store.iconography: Stylized glass shard refracting light into a V motif
store.brand_story_one_sentence: Born from glass and grit, Vera Lux illuminates New York with fierce, sustainable luxury that empowers women to wear their truth.
